results.name: Irregular table: row n (n>=1) consists of numbers 0..A084556(n)-1.
comment: The term a(n) tells from which position (zero-based, starting from the left hand end of permutation) of the corresponding permutation in A030298 the term A030298(n) should be picked from.
link: A. Karttunen, Rows 1..998 of the irregular table, flattened.
